 UC strikes landmark open access deal 
 University secures trailblazing agreement with world’s largest scientific publisher, Elsevier 
 Read more 
 
 
   
 
 
 
 "Building a National Finding Aid Network" 
 Collaborative research and development initiative receives IMLS funding support 
 Read more 
 
 
   
 
 
 
 A New Exhibition on Calisphere 
 “They Were Really Us”: The UCSF Community’s Early Response to AIDS  highlights the ways UCSF clinicians and staff broke ground in the fight against HIV/AIDS in the 1980-90s. 
 Read more 
 
 
   
 
 
 
 The (Virtual) UC Library is Open! 
 UC students, faculty, and staff now have temporary emergency access to over 13 million digital volumes (public domain and in-copyright) held in the HathiTrust Digital Library. 
 Read more
